mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum AS RNO, a.* FROM (SELECT m_no AS NO, m_t_no AS TNO, m_name AS NAME, m_price AS PRICE, m_body AS BODY, m_savename AS IMGNAME, m_grade AS GRADE, m_keyword AS KEYWORD FROM menu WHERE m_isshow='Y' ORDER BY m_no ) a) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM menu WHERE m_isshow='Y'
SELECT t_no AS TNO, t_name AS TNAME FROM truckinfo ORDER BY t_no

SELECT oc_t_no AS TNO, t_name AS TNAME, p_lat AS PLAT, p_lng AS PLNG FROM openclose, place, truckinfo WHERE oc_t_no = t_no AND oc_p_no = p_no AND to_char(oc_open,'YYYY/MM/DD')=to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')

SELECT t_name AS TNAME, pp_date AS PDATE, p_placeName AS PNAME FROM truckinfo, plan, place WHERE pp_t_no = t_no AND pp_p_no = p_no AND t_isshow = 'Y' AND pp_date BETWEEN to_date(#{startdate},'YYYY/MM/DD') AND to_date(#{enddate},'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY t_no, pp_date
SELECT p_no AS PNO, t_name AS TNAME, p_placename AS PNAME, pp_date AS PDATE FROM plan, truckinfo, place WHERE pp_t_no = t_no AND pp_p_no = p_no AND t_no=#{tno}
SELECT t_name AS TNAME FROM truckinfo WHERE t_no=#{tno}
